title: $:/plugins/benwebber/rfc
name: rfc
author: Ben Webber
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/README":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/README","text":"''rfc'' makes it easy to reference [[IETF RFCs|https://www.ietf.org/standards/rfcs/]]. <$list filter="[variables[]match[twdoc.list-macros]]" emptyMessage="Install [ext[twdoc|https://benwebber.github.io/tiddlywiki-plugins/#twdoc]] to view documentation."> <> "},"$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/styles/static":{"text":".tw-block{display:block}.tw-flex{display:flex}.tw-w-full{width:100%}.tw-border-l-0{border-left-width:0}.tw-border-r{border-right-width:1px}.tw-border-t-0{border-top-width:0}.tw-px-2{padding-left:.5rem;padding-right:.5rem}.tw-py-1{padding-top:.25rem;padding-bottom:.25rem}","title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/styles/static","type":"text/css","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/macros/private":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/macros/private","text":"\define rfc.link(number, url, text: "", class:"") <$set name=text filter="[<__text__>is[blank]] +[then[RFC $number$]else<__text__>]" select=0> > rel="noopener noreferrer" class={{{ [<__class__>] rfc +[!is[blank]join[ ]] }}} data-rfc-number="$number$"><> \end "},"$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/macros/public":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/macros/public","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","twdoc.param.number":"The RFC number.","twdoc.param.text":"The link text. If not specified, the macro will generate text like "RFC 4122".","twdoc.param.text.optional":"true","twdoc.param.class":"A CSS class to add to the link.","twdoc.param.class.optional":"true","twdoc.rfc.description":"<> is an alias of <>.","twdoc.rfc.txt.description":"Link to the RFC's plain text version.","twdoc.rfc.html.description":"Link to the RFC's HTML version.","twdoc.rfc.pdf.description":"Link to the RFC's PDF version.","twdoc.rfc.tracker.description":"Link to the Datatracker records for the RFC.","twdoc.rfc.diff.description":"Link to the diff of the RFC and its most recent draft.","twdoc.rfc.errata.description":"Link to the RFC's errata.","twdoc.rfc.inline-errata.description":"Link to an HTML version of the RFC with inline errata.","twdoc.rfc.bibtex.description":"Link to RFC's BibTeX record.","text":"\define rfc.txt(number, text, class) \import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/macros/private]] <$macrocall $name=rfc.link number=<<__number__>> url="https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc$number$.txt" text=<<__text__>> class=<<__class__>> /> \end \define rfc.html(number, text, class) \import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/macros/private]] <$macrocall $name=rfc.link number=<<__number__>> url="https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc$number$.html" text=<<__text__>> class=<<__class__>> /> \end \define rfc.pdf(number, text, class) \import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/macros/private]] <$macrocall $name=rfc.link number=<<__number__>> url="https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/pdfrfc/rfc$number$.txt.pdf" text=<<__text__>> class=<<__class__>> /> \end \define rfc.tracker(number, text, class) \import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/macros/private]] <$macrocall $name=rfc.link number=<<__number__>> url="https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/rfc$number$/" text=<<__text__>> class=<<__class__>> /> \end \define rfc.diff(number, text, class) \import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/macros/private]] <$macrocall $name=rfc.link number=<<__number__>> url="https://tools.ietf.org/rfcdiff?url2=rfc$number$" text=<<__text__>> class=<<__class__>> /> \end \define rfc.errata(number, text, class) \import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/macros/private]] <$macrocall $name=rfc.link number=<<__number__>> url="https://www.rfc-editor.org/errata/rfc$number$" text=<<__text__>> class=<<__class__>> /> \end \define rfc.inline-errata(number, text, class) \import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/macros/private]] <$macrocall $name=rfc.link number=<<__number__>> url="https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/inline-errata/rfc$number$.html" text=<<__text__>> class=<<__class__>> /> \end \define rfc.bibtex(number, text, class) \import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/macros/private]] <$macrocall $name=rfc.link number=<<__number__>> url="https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/rfc$number$/bibtex/" text=<<__text__>> class=<<__class__>> /> \end \define rfc(number, text, class) <$macrocall $name=rfc.txt number=<<__number__>> text=<<__text__>> class=<<__class__>> /> "},"$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/ui/ViewTemplate/header":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/rfc/ui/ViewTemplate/header","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","list-before":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body","description":"When a tiddler defines an `rfc.number` field, add a header with links to common pages for that RFC. This is similar to the header shown in the HTML version. Add a custom class to the header with the `rfc.class` field.","text":"<$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]get[rfc.number]]" variable=number>
RFC <> <$macrocall $name=rfc.txt number=<> text="TXT" /> <$macrocall $name=rfc.html number=<> text="HTML" /> <$macrocall $name=rfc.pdf number=<> text="PDF" /> <$macrocall $name=rfc.tracker number=<> text="Tracker" /> <$macrocall $name=rfc.diff number=<> text="Diff" /> <$macrocall $name=rfc.errata number=<> text="Errata" />
"}}}
